channel.title: Comments on: Sharing ASP.net Session State Between Applications with SQL Server – Part II
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: Once configured, the SQL session state works the same as the normal one with regard to just about everything except the backing storage.
item.content:encoded: Once configured, the SQL session state works the same as the normal one with regard to just about everything except the backing storage.

item.title: By: Aravind
item.dc:creator: Aravind
item.content:encoded:
Hi..
I have a question here about session time out.
If multiple websites share the same session, What happens when session time out occurs?

item.title: By: Dedicated ASP .Net Devoloper

item.content:encoded:
